name: rce-ordinary - want (envy mix)

shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000

shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=dec=pow(.98,60/fps);
per_frame_2=num0=numbeat*(abs(num-num_att)+pump)+bnot(numbeat)*num0;
per_frame_3=pump=numbeat*(sin(t)*.1+.1)+bnot(numbeat)*pump;
per_frame_4=pump=pump*dec;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=num_b0=num_b;
per_frame_7=num=abs((bass-bass_att)+(mid-mid_att)+(treb-treb_att));
per_frame_8=num_att=num_att*.95+num*.05;
per_frame_9=num_b=above(num,1-pump)*above(abs(num-num_att),num0);
per_frame_10=numbeat=bnot(equal(num_b0,num_b));
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=t=t+num*.1;
per_frame_13=bc=bc+numbeat;
per_frame_14=bass_flow=bass_flow+3*abs(bass-bass_att)/fps;
per_frame_15=treb_flow=treb_flow+3*abs(treb-treb_att)/fps;
per_frame_16=mid_flow=mid_flow+3*abs(mid-mid_att)/fps;
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=wave_r=.5+.5*sin(t*1.1+bc*2)+sin(bass_flow)*.25*(frame%2);
per_frame_19=wave_g=.5+.5*sin(t*0.8+bc*3.14)+sin(treb_flow)*.25*(frame%2);
per_frame_20=wave_b=.5+.5*sin(t*1.3)+sin(mid_flow)*.25*(frame%2);
per_frame_21=wave_mystery=frame%2;
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=q1=t;
per_frame_24=q2=bc;
per_frame_25=q3=2+4*sin(t*0.33+time*1.42+bc*0.1);
per_frame_26=q4=2+3*cos(t*0.15+time*1.41+bc*0.2);
per_pixel_1=rot=sin(rad*3.14+time)*sin(q1)*.3;
per_pixel_2=zoom=zoom-.05*sin(rad*1.5+q1);
per_pixel_3=cx=cx+.2*sin(x*2*q4+time);
per_pixel_4=cy=cy+.2*sin(y*2*q3+time);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`    ret=max(ret,tex2D(sampler_fc_main,lerp(uv_orig,uv,0.5))*.97); //trails
warp_6=`
warp_7=`    //add water effect
warp_8=`    ret+=(ret-GetBlur1(uv))*0.15;
warp_9=`    
warp_10=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_11=`    ret *= 0.97; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_12=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 echo=(uv-0.5)*float2(-1,-1)+0.5;
comp_4=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_5=`    ret=lerp(ret,GetPixel(echo),0.4);
comp_6=`
comp_7=`    ret*=ret*ret; //darken 2x
comp_8=`    ret+=0.05*cos(lum(ret)*15+7); //some stripes...
comp_9=`    ret=pow(ret,float3(0.9,0.5,1.3)); //palletize
comp_10=`    ret=lerp(ret,GetBlur1(uv)*(1-rad*1.2)*0.7,rad); //focus
comp_11=`    ret.xy=ret.zy; //make the color back to green (with some purples)
comp_12=`}
